title: When your adc dies in a 4 man gank bot...
body:
And you just decide to accept your fate instead of wasting summs as support...

https://d.facdn.net/art/johnnythehedgehog/1531215849/1531215849.johnnythehedgehog_lulu_couch_meme.png

replies.body:
You have 2 mid mages and 2 top engagers (traditionally).

2 of them are bot... the others are likely mid and top... which ones?

> [{quoted}](name=Mokuto Bunshi,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WWqFId3I,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-10T18:24:57.872+0000)
>
> You have 2 mid mages and 2 top engagers (traditionally).
> 
> 2 of them are bot... the others are likely mid and top... which ones?

In this meta, Kled is one of top 10 supports, so trust me, I could toss literally 4 champions in that joke and it still works these days.
You're talking to a guy who mains kled and DOES kled support.... which is why I asked who is mid and top XD
Still doesn't matter, could do Kled adc and joke still applies. At this rate, trying to guess team comps is a literal roll of the dice since adcs stopped being relevant to the pros.
True, but gimme jinx any day and i'll carry my own lane :P with or without crit nerfs.
Well, I'll take your word on that, sometimes there are mains that still survive the meta.
it is ok to die in a 4 man gank lol
